Name: PREHISTORIC
Description: Archeological study of aboriginal cultures before the advent of written records.

Name: HISTORIC --- ABORIGINAL
Description: Archeological study of aboriginal cultures after the advent of written records.

Name: HISTORIC --- NON-ABORIGINAL
Description: Archeological study of non-aboriginal cultures after the advent of written records.

Name: ASIAN
Description: The history of persons having origins in the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent.

Name: BLACK
Description: The history of persons having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa.

Name: EUROPEAN
Description: The history of persons having origins in Europe.

Name: HISPANIC
Description: The history of persons having origins in the Spanish-speaking areas of the Caribbean, Mexico, Central America, and South America.

Name: NATIVE AMERICAN
Description: The history of persons having origins in any of the original peoples of North America, including American Indian and American Eskimo cultural groups.

Name: PACIFIC ISLANDER
Description: The history of persons having origins in the Pacific Islands, including Polynesia, Micronesia, and Melanesia.

Name: OTHER
Description: The history of persons having origins in other parts of the world, such as the Middle East or North Africa.
